title: Unable to delete solr if white space exist in category
description: I am unable to delete solr data. Please check my question https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46189259/unable-to-delete-record-from-solr-if-any-white-space-there-in-php

comments.content:
This is not an appropriate use of Solr's JIRA, we try to reserve the JIRA system for code issues rather than usage questions.

Please ask the question here: solr-user@lucene.apache.org, see: http://lucene.apache.org/solr/community.html#mailing-lists-irc

When you raise question on the user's list, include pertinent details, including sample data, queries and responses if possible, along with what you expect to see but don't.
comments.author: Erick Erickson
